info.title: BIG-IQ ASM Signatures
info.description: API used to list all ASM signatures.

items.description: Collection of web application security signiatures.

kind.description: Type information for ASM web application security signatures - cm:asm:working-config:signatures:signaturecollectionstate.

requestOperationId.description: Unique id assigned to rest operation.

requestBody.description: The data in the request body. GET (None)

errorStack.description: Error stack trace returned by java.

items.description: Collection of web application security signatures. Public URI path not registered.

kind.description: Type information for ASM web application security signatures - cm:asm:working-config:signatures:signaturecollectionstate.

requestOperationId.description: Unique id assigned to rest operation.

requestBody.description: The data in the request body. GET (None)

errorStack.description: Error stack trace returned by java.

items.description: Collection of web application security signatures properties.

kind.description: Type information for web application security signatures collection object.

selfLink.description: A reference link URI to web application security signatures collection object.

generation.description: A integer that will track change made to web application security signatures collection object. generation.

lastUpdateMicros.description: Update time (micros) for last change made to web application security signatures collection object. time.

signatureId.description: Unique id assigned to a ASM signature object.

revision.description: BIG-IQ maintains a version # to track changes of ASM signatures.

isUserDefined.description: Is this ASM signature created by a user or pre packaged by the system.

accuracy.description: Indicates the ability of the attack signature to identify the attack including susceptibility to false-positive alarms: Low: Indicates a high likelihood of false positives. Medium: Indicates some likelihood of false positives. High: Indicates a low likelihood of false positives.

risk.description: Indicates the level of potential damage this attack might cause if it is successful: Low: Indicates the attack does not cause direct damage or reveal highly sensitive data. Medium: Indicates the attack may reveal sensitive data or cause moderate damage. High: Indicates the attack may cause a full system compromise.

signatureType.description: Attack types describes common web application attacks that signatures can detect. Table 11.1 lists types - https://support.f5.com/kb/en-us/products/big-ip_asm/manuals/product/config_guide_asm_10_2_0/asm_attack_sigs.html

bundleVersion.description: Indicates the bundle version of the attack signature.

attackTypeReference.description: Reference link to attack type properties. ex. uuid, name, bigipAttackId

systems.description: Displays which systems (for example web applications, web servers databases, and application frameworks) the signature protects.

matchesWithinParameter.description: Use this built-in filter to display only signatures that match the attack type that you select.

matchesWithinCookie.description: Array of reference links to user used to create self-service task. mgmt/shared/authz/users/admin

matchesWihtinJson.description: A unique id string for the BIGIQ acting as a device owner.

matchesWithinGwt.description: Type information for this self-service task object.

matchesWithinXml.description: Type information for this self-service task object.

matchesWithinRequest.description: Type information for this self-service task object.

matchesWithinUri.description: Type information for this self-service task object.

matchesWithinPlainText.description: Type information for this self-service task object.

modificationDateMicros.description: Type information for this self-service task object.

partition.description: BIGIP partition this ASM attack signature object exists.

id.description: Unique id assocaited with ASM attack signature.

selfLink.description: A reference link URI to the ASM attack signature object.

generation.description: A integer that will track change made to a ASM attack signature object. generation.

lastUpdateMicros.description: Update time (micros) for last change made to a ASM attack signature object. time.

get.summary: List all ASM signatures as a collection.
get.description: Returns the collection of ASM signatures.

404.description: Error response Public URI path not registered.

get.summary: Used to get a single instance of a ASM signature object.
get.description: Returns a ASM signature object identified by id for an endpoint URI.

404.description: Error response Public URI path not registered.
